item.title: orientation
item.description: Rotate the image 90 degrees at a time. The module is enabled by default and the orientation is automatically set based on the image’s Exif data. The orientation can also be set using the selected images module in the lighttable view. ðŸ”—module controls rotate Double click the label to reset the image’s rotation counter-clockwise Rotate the image 90 degrees counter-clockwise clockwise Rotate the image 90 degrees clockwise
